cards.title: C0 VSCode Extension
cards.description: A VSCode Extension made for the CS course 15-122
cards.longDescription: As part of transitioning the 15-122 course to supporting the modern text editor VSCode, a group of TAs worked together to create an extension that enabled autocompletion, syntax highlighting, static type-checking, and more. This helped students with learning the new language C0 for this course.
